org.epics.ioc.util
Enum ScanType

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ScanType>
      org.epics.ioc.util.ScanType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ScanType>
public enum ScanType
extends java.lang.Enum<ScanType>

Defines that scan types, i.e. what causes a record to process.

Author:
mrk

Enum Constant Detail

passive

public static final ScanType passive
A passively scanned record. This is a record that is processed only because some other record or a channel access client asks that the record be processed.

event

public static final ScanType event
An event scanned record. The record is processed when an event announcer requests processing.

periodic

public static final ScanType periodic
A periodically scanned record.
